discourse_list.title: About the Sidestream Auction Services Core Unit category

content.content: The Sidestream Auction Services Core Unit is responsible for providing and maintaining auction services through open-source development. See their mandate here . Membership of Sidestream Auction Services can be seen in @sidestream-core-unit group. A Core Unit is a building block for organizing work for the DAO. Facilitators define long-term work areas and cover a broad set of focus and responsibilities for the protocol to be secure and successful. Core Unit Mandates set the direction of the work that Facilitators must help carry out. To read more about Core Units, head to MIP39: Core Unit Framework 6.
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
